subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Paranormal investigations!?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Well the guy that seemed to be so demanding was just pushy cuz he had heard 
I was going to stop all my work, and he wanted a box, so we go that 
straightened out.

Frank
